comments.raw_text:
Reordering the binary should result in a >=50% reduction in library IO.
Chrome guys did a PE rewriter + profiling tools in http://code.google.com/p/sawbuck/wiki/SyzygyDesign . The plan is to adopt their stuff for Mozilla.
comments.creator: taras.mozilla@glek.net
